Html:
Hi,

Can anyone help me find a simple example of how to use IConfirmNavigationRequest with unity and WPF. The example that comes with the Prism samples and documentation uses silverlight, and from what I can see the dll files are slightly different.

 

I understand how it should work, I just want to see a simple example where I can bind a command to a button in my view and see the flow through the viewmodel where I can see a prompt appear, then do something based on whether the user answers yes or no.  I know it has to be possible, but in the interests of preserving my sanity can anyone help!!!

Hi,

I believe you might find the following blog posts useful, as they provide different samples implementing IConfirmNavigationRequest with unity and WPF:

  • Prism Template Pack 1.4 (Quickstart Solution with Unity) from David Hill
  • Simplifying Prism WPF Navigation from Karl shifflett

I hope you find this handy,

Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadamiï»¿
